analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Vote.depositAndVote (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#191-193):
	External calls:
	- deposit(yeas.add(nays)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#192)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposits (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#192-193)

Reentrancy in Vote.execute (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#219-235):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(proposal.deadline < block.timestamp || proposal.yeas > (token.totalSupply() / 2),Voting is not complete) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#221-228)
	- proposal.target.call(proposal.data) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#232-233)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposals (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#234-235)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(proposal.deadline < block.timestamp || proposal.yeas > (token.totalSupply() / 2),Voting is not complete)

analysis.description:
Vote.withdraw (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#154-160) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,units) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#160)

Reentrancy in Vote.deposit (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#147-152):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),units),Transfer failed) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#147-150)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposits (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#150-152)

Reentrancy in Vote.depositAndVote (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#191-193):
	External calls:
	- deposit(yeas.add(nays)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#192)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposals (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#192-193)

Vote.withdraw (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#154-160) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(deposits[msg.sender].lockedUntil < block.timestamp,Deposit locked) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#155-159)

Vote.vote (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#169-187) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(proposals[proposalId].deadline > block.timestamp,Voting closed) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#169-171)

Vote.execute (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#219-235) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(proposal.deadline < block.timestamp || proposal.yeas > (token.totalSupply() / 2),Voting is not complete) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#221-228)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(proposal.deadline < block.timestamp || proposal.yeas > (token.totalSupply() / 2),Voting is not complete)

analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_token' of Vote. (/unique_chucks/28/0xe000cd29eb1f596f4fc1d9873eb1618cd3846f08.sol#127) is not in mixedCase
